TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IInvocationHandler implements class Android.Runtime.IJavaObject, class System.IDisposable

Docs.summary: Implementors of this interface dispatch methods invoked on proxy instances.

remarks.para:
Implementors of this interface dispatch methods invoked on proxy instances.
See Also

MemberSignature.Value: public Java.Lang.Object Invoke (Java.Lang.Object proxy, Java.Lang.Reflect.Method method, Java.Lang.Object[] args);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Java.Lang.Object Invoke(class Java.Lang.Object proxy, class Java.Lang.Reflect.Method method, class Java.Lang.Object[] args) cil managed

Docs.param: the proxy instance on which the method was invoked
the method invoked on the proxy instance
an array of objects containing the parameters passed to the method, or null if no arguments are expected. Primitive types are boxed.
Docs.summary: Handles the method which was originally invoked on the proxy instance.
Docs.exception: the exception to throw from the invoked method on the proxy. The exception must match one of the declared exception types of the invoked method or any unchecked exception type. If not then an UndeclaredThrowableException is thrown
